name: Freddies Villas Ubud Bali
address: Jalan Gunung Abang, Banjar, Penataran, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80423, Indonesia
review 1:
During our recent vacation, our accommodations at Freddies Villa were beyond exceptional. The private pool room we stayed in exceeded our expectations with its luxurious size, cleanliness, and ample amenities. The villa itself was surrounded by beautiful greenery, creating a peaceful atmosphere that allowed for total relaxation.

We thoroughly enjoyed our two-night stay at Freddies and highly recommend it to others. As a precaution against mosquitoes, I advise keeping the room door closed  after evening hours.
review 2:
I stayed at Vila Property for 3 days, and it was an absolutely wonderful experience! From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the stunning architecture and beautifully maintained grounds. The staff were exceptionally friendly and accommodating, always ready to assist with a smile.

The rooms were spacious, clean, and well-equipped with modern amenities. The comfortable bed and serene ambiance made for a restful stay.

The location is isolated from ubud market and it’s very hard to find anything in walking distance .

Overall, Vila Property exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a luxurious and relaxing getaway. I can’t wait to return!
review 3:
We’ve recently stayed here. Service is very poor and food was worst.
They take breakfast order on the previous day and it includes only one breakfast per person, you cannot order more. This was the worst part.
You can see lizards in the room. The place where it is located is also off.

If you are intending to book a hotel in ubud then please look for better options
review 4:
Hi All, we stayed for 3 days in this hotel. The hotel room’s Seems to be ok, we had hard time on the day we arrived as the AC is not enough for us due to high humidity for such big room preferably need big AC or the AC condition might not be good. However hotel staff tried their level best to help us by calling the technician to visit how ever no much difference.
We have taken the pool villa for one day  that was excellent, the view and pool and the open bathroom seems to be very good and we enjoyed the pool villa so much. I suggest to take pool villa over here if you prefer to have stay over.
review 5:
We recently stayed at this hotel and were thoroughly disappointed. The room was infested with mosquitoes, which made it impossible to sleep. The breakfast buffet was underwhelming, with stale options. But the worst part was the washroom. It was poorly maintained and loose faucets. We will not be returning to this hotel again.

If you are booking any holiday packages through travel websites, please make sure this hotel is not in your itinerary.

name: Santi Mandala Villa & Spa
address: Banjar Bucuan, C797+2RQ, Jl. Sekar Jepun, Batuan, Sukawati, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: Enjoyed staying in Santi mandala with family. This resort is perfect place for newly married couples looking for a timeout in nature. Well maintained facility. However be prepared to handle insects & rodents as it very close to rice fields and river.
review 2: Can’t fault anybody at Santi mandala everybody was so lovely and friendly and made sure we had everything we needed. Outdoor shower and toilet facilities was a nice change and breakfast was delicious with a good selection. Only issue is a bit far from town but very easy to get a grab there
review 3:
If your nature lover, this is the mist visit resort. Quiet , beautiful place and large private villa  with 2 rivers and 2 water falls within the resort,
Away from the city buzz, can't do any shopping near by.
review 4: Fabulous views, food and experience. This exceeded our expectations - incredible outdoor very private bathroom. Noises from nature just as mist good spas but this time they were all real.
review 5: We stayed here for 2 days. Best resort in ubud. Here we found the pure veg breakfast like bread. Rooms here are too big and environment here is good. This is budget friendly resort.

name: Nasi Bali Restaurant Ubud
address: Banjar Bucuan Desa Batuan, Singapadu Tengah, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: We were in the area and were looking for warungs to have local food when we found this place on Google map. The restaurant is located within a resort and was totally empty when we arrived that we thought we were at the wrong place. However, we were really impressed by the food! Though the prices are definitely not cheap for local food, their food was really good. My mie goreng had breaded prawns as well which I have never seen it being included in a mie goreng before but they were really good and not greasy at all. While the Ayam Bakar Bucuan (spicy grilled chicken) which my husband had was a tad dry, the flavour was still good. Service was great too although we waited a while for the food. Overall, I will recommend this restaurant if you are in the area and looking for local food.
review 2: Good cosy place and serves good food with a good view. Its near a river bank. I loved the pork ribs, chicken breasts​ and Balinese food. They are great friendly people.
review 3: The food was good Indonesian food. Had the crispy duck. There were three beautiful Balinese dances. However, the venue is covered outdoor and the evening is dependent on the climate on that day.
review 4: Food is very tasty and good portion
review 5: Loved the food here! Had the crispy duck which was amazing and the snapper in banana leaves.

name: NGURAH PAINTING
address: Jl. Raya Negara, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: We are from from Australia and have come past this paintig shop. Best paintings I've seen in Bali. Must visit and buy paintings. Genuine hand made drawings and paintings. Wide range of cultural, modern, abstract, traditional and young artist types.
review 2:
Nestled in the heart of Bali, Ngurah Painting is a hidden gem that beckons art enthusiasts seeking a genuine connection to the island's vibrant cultural tapestry. This gallery isn't just a space to peruse artwork; it's a portal to the soulful expressions of a community of artists whose passion and talent weave through each brushstroke.

Walking into Ngurah Painting feels like stepping into an artistic oasis, away from the bustling tourist hubs. The ambiance is serene, allowing visitors to immerse themselves in the kaleidoscope of colors and stories encapsulated in every painting. The gallery is a testament to Bali's rich artistic heritage, and it provides a platform for local artists to share their narratives with the world.

What sets Ngurah Painting apart is its commitment to showcasing the diversity of Balinese art. From traditional Balinese paintings that capture the island's mystical landscapes to contemporary pieces that reflect the artists' evolving perspectives, the gallery offers a spectrum of styles that cater to varying tastes. This curation not only celebrates the time-honored techniques but also highlights the dynamic evolution of Balinese artistry.

One of the most captivating aspects of Ngurah Painting is the personalized journey it offers to its patrons. The knowledgeable and passionate staff take the time to share insights into the artists' backgrounds, inspirations, and the cultural significance behind each piece. This interactive approach fosters a deeper appreciation for the art on display, turning a visit into an enriching cultural experience.

Navigating through the gallery feels like strolling through an art-filled labyrinth, with each turn revealing a new discovery. Whether you're a seasoned art collector or a first-time buyer, Ngurah Painting provides a welcoming environment for exploration. The pricing is reasonable, ensuring that art lovers of all budgets can bring a piece of Bali's artistic spirit into their homes.

Beyond the aesthetic appeal, Ngurah Painting stands as a beacon of community support. By purchasing artwork from this gallery, patrons directly contribute to the livelihoods of local artists, fostering sustainability and growth within the Balinese artistic community. It's not just about buying art; it's about investing in the stories, traditions, and futures of the talented individuals who breathe life into each canvas.

In conclusion, Ngurah Painting is more than a gallery; it's a sanctuary for art connoisseurs seeking authenticity, a haven for those wanting to connect with Bali's artistic soul. If you're in search of a profound and immersive art experience, make your way to this hidden gem and let the brushstrokes of Balinese creativity paint a lasting impression on your heart and home.
review 3: Brilliant artwork created by super talented local artists. Visit here and buy something to support these wonderful people.
review 4: Very nice art gallery to go to. You can buy beautiful paintings here, and you can haggle for the price. They will explain how they paint as well. Also, it's possible to have your painting wrapped in a hardened case so it's suited for travel.
review 5: Very nice collection , price can be negotiate,  nice place

name: Muji Art Family
address: Jl. Sekar Jepun No.1, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: Excellent range of genuine local artwork. Something for all tastes, good prices and bartering is a must. Care wrapping the products for travel was also excellent.
review 2:
They have a painting class as well. We visited with no appointment but my kid could learn painting. The teacher was professional and helped a lot how to mix the color properily.
Tuition fee was reasonable. Thank you🙏
review 3:
Great artworks. Must stop when in Bali

Thank you 😊
review 4: Nice art gallery and friendly people. You are free to watch how the paintings are created. Huge selection of different types of art directions and motives.
review 5: Paintings are exquisite, people are amazing,can buy anything from one price range to top price but amazing artwork

name: Wr rare kubal
address: C798+MHX, Jl. Sekar Cemp., Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: ADDICTED COFFEE & EATERY
address: Jl. Raya Batuan, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: I try come here , the place very good you can chill here , the food & drink very tasty , also the staff so humble 😍😍😍😍
review 2:
Nice club of young people trying to create a chill but fancy place. Really nice in this region and walkable from santi mandala resort.
At the moment they are in an ongoing renovation so not all items on the menu are always available. We went there twice and twice we were happy with the delicious food and drinks. I can especially recommend the cold taro drink.
review 3:
The place is perfect guys, recommendations for places to hang out and do assignments
Perfect food and service 🔥🔥
review 4:
First the coffee, warm not got.
Then the croissant
Wanted them together.
So I ordered the house specially - matcha.
Sorry no matcha.
So î ordered another coffee. Hot
Had finished the croissant by then.
The coffee was hot though.
. . .
review 5: Good quality coffee with very affordable price! I really love my vanilla latte😊 Place is very clean with vintage decor.

name: Pondok D'Alas Villa
address: Jalan Raya Mawang Banjar Lodsema, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia
review 1: Stay for a month and it is superb. The owner is very friendly and helpful; the place is simple and nice ... the garden is amazing ... a lot of fruits and chili, lime and many others .. It is fantastic for long stay, slow life and just chill ...
review 2:
I had a really good experience here!
Last month, I stayed here for 21 nights. Already miss this place.

It was quiet, clean, comfortable and the owner was really kind.
Price is also very affordable, especially if you choose a long stay.

It felt like my own house because there's a bedroom, bathroom and kitchen inside, also own garden, furniture and other stuff is also available like, AC, fan, fridge, frying pan, mineral water, tea, coffee, sugar, etc.

I definitely recomend this place! And don't worry if you don't bring your own vehicle, I'm sure the owner also has transport services.
review 3: Nice place and gracious hosts. Recommended!

name: RedDoorz near Bali Zoo Ubud
address: Jalan Gunung Abang, Banjar Penataran, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Lodtunduh, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: Love the place, It is clean and neat!! for that price point, nothing beats this place!! Also the owner is very friendly, so I ask him a lot bout Bali!!
review 2: This is an affordable hotel / guest house with a very clean room and friendly staffs. Really love to stay here again next year for Bali Spirit Festival!
review 3:
⚠️⚠️⚠️ Closed temporary ⚠️⚠️⚠️

I never stayed here but today went there because I planned to stay here next week but it's closed

name: Letung Villa
address: C788+435, Batuan, Sukawati, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1:
Recently had the pleasure of staying at Vila Letung, and it exceeded all my expectations. Never had a problem with what was stated in previous reviews (trash etc.). It's tucked away in a serene corner. Definitely a hidden gem with a perfect blend of comfort, hospitality, and natural beauty.

The surroundings are lush and the gardens are well-maintained to give a peaceful atmosphere!
review 2: The accommodation itself is a haven of tranquility. The lush green surroundings and well-maintained gardens create a peaceful atmosphere, making it an ideal escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The architecture of Vila Letung is both charming and modern, providing a perfect balance between contemporary comfort and traditional aesthetics.
review 3:
*Disclaimer: I originally posted this review on December 16th, 2022 while my girlfriend and I were staying in the villa, and the landlord of the property angrily harassed and bullied us into taking our reviews down. DO NOT COME HERE.*
The entire village burns their trash, including styrofoam, plastic, batteries, and every kind of garbage you can imagine. This leads to the villa to often be filled with toxic smoke, which has made me and my girlfriend very sick during our entire stay. We began developing painful acne, have had headaches since we first arrived, and have been sick to our stomachs to the point of throwing up frequently. We have ended up leaving three weeks earlier than our scheduled stay, and AirBnb offered to pay for our next place since the circumstances were so awful. This would be a lovely stay if you are in the villa for only minutes at a time, otherwise if you intend to spend a lot of time here; be prepared to become sick. We will not be coming back to this village, and I strongly advise you stay elsewhere until this issue is resolved.
review 4: Small, quiet and serene location. Staff were great hosts and attended to every request much quicker than expected. Would definitely choose another Bali stay with villa.
review 5: Beautiful private villa’s. Modern interior with a Balinese twist. This is the real Bali nature experience, in the midst of a local village and with beautiful scenery views. Absolutely perfect, you can relax and unwind here.

name: River House Ubud
address: C787+FGM, Jl. Raya Batuan, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: The village is cozy and beautiful, the rooms are comfortable and the host Ayan is simply the best!

name: Warung beten coklat
address: C7C8+GC6, Lodtunduh, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: Warung Batan Kopi
address: C7C8+GC6, Lodtunduh, Ubud, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: Puri Astrani by WizZeLa
address: C7C8+4C9, Jl. Sekar Cemp., Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: Paon rasa resto
address: Jl. Sekar Cemp., Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: We've been hier several times during our holiday. Food was delicious, especially the soup was excellent! We really enjoyed the food here and the vibe as well! Very good quality for the price you pay!😊👍
review 2: Nice place,food is delicious and cheap pricy
review 3: Good cheap food. I checked with the owner/ staff and they open at 8:30am, close at 7pm. I updated Google maps. Closed on Mondays.

name: Vila Air Terjun
address: Gg. Mawar No.21, Batuan, Banjar, Bucuan, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: Sate Babi Enak Sambal Matah Pak Sandeh
address: Jl. Raya Batuan No.12, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: My favorite sate sambal matah sere. Enak Wangi. Very Recommended for my friends. Authentic local balinese cruise.
review 2: Hidden gem, tasty pork satay with balinese sambal
review 3: Great pork satay under the mango tree. Must try
review 4: Great place for pork satay. Better to take away.

name: Warung Tan Poh
address: Jl. Raya Negara, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1:
The food here is amazing. We ordered Ayam pedas manis and Ayam sambal matah. They are stir fried chicken (Ayam=chicken) with a little bit spicy sauce. It’s very tasty, local price, big portion (compared with their price). I love this place, hidden gem!

Rice 5 IDR/dish
Ayam 15 IDR/dish

name: Bagus Bali Greatest driver
address: C797+4GQ, Jl. Sekar Jepun, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

name: Warung Bu Made
address: C789+P6H, Jl. Raya Batuan, Batuan, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia
review 1: One of the places to eat Balinese lawar which is located in the Senggol Batu Sukawati market. the menu is appropriate and delicious.
review 2: Beautiful place and very nice host
